system.availability: Protects user against vacuum. Provides 12 hours of air, but imposes -10 to Agility Tests. Poor Versions have six hours. Good/Best have no Agility Penalty. Whenever taking Rending or Explosive Damage, 40% chance that suit is breached. Breached suits do not count as sealed (Can be repaired with tape, patches, etc, as a Full Action)
